GenomeControl
UserControl
public
GenomeControl
FnRegressionControl
NeatGenomeControl
PreyCaptureControl

A user control for genome visualization.  This is used for displaying a genome directly (e.g. a neural net structure), or some other type of visualization that uses the genome, e.g. a task view that shows how the genome performs on some task.

Variables
_genome
protected IGenome _genome

The genome being displayed by the control.

Functions
GenomeControl
public GenomeControl()

Constructs a new instance of GenomeControl.

Properties
Genome
public IGenome Genome { get; set }

Gets of sets the genome object to display.

Functions
OnGenomeUpdated
public virtual void OnGenomeUpdated()

Optional code to run when the genome is updated.
